text: Josepɨn anabam, mati bulmakaun atiar apurir komɨn pumuning itimɨn mɨn bar gavgafi. An otarir mam Manase, an ovavir borir bar avɨrim, me bar gavgavigha, mati bulmakaun kamɨn komɨn mam. Ezɨ an otarir igharazim Efraim, an ovavir borir bar avɨrim, me bar gavgavigha, mati bulmakaun kamɨn komɨn igharazim. Egh aning uan komɨn kamningɨn ikɨzir igharazibagh iniv me akuntɨ, me saghon tintinibar nguazir kamɨn mɨkebaba bar dagh iregham.”
